abstract: Chicago Tribune reports seven people killed, including 7-year-old boy, and 41 wounded in gun violence over Fourth of July weekend in Chicago.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Tribune reported that as of late Sunday afternoon, seven people had been killed and 41 people wounded by gun violence during the extended Fourth of July weekend.

headline.main: At Least 7 Killed in Chicago Shootings
headline.print_headline: At Least 7 Killed in Chicago Shootings

snippet: The Chicago Tribune reported that as of late Sunday afternoon, seven people had been killed and 41 people wounded by gun violence during the extended Fourth of July weekend.
